title: Brand new 1 bed guest house!
posting_body: Brand New Junior 1 bedroom, 1 bath small apartment (475 sqft - like a studio with a separate bedroom) located at a Private Residence, rare opportunity first time available.
Will consider only 1 person for the Lease.
Brand New Cabinets, Countertops, Refrigerator, Oven, Stovetop, Microwave
Plenty of Room for Dining Area
Brand New Flooring and Newly tiled shower and counters
Large Mirrored Wardrobe in Bedroom
A/C in both rooms
Private Entrance, in Single Family Neighborhood
Quiet Street with Convenient Parking on street.
Location Location Location!

- Conveniently located between Beverly and Melrose on Laurel Avenue by the Beverly Center and the Grove, and just a walk away from the Melrose shopping district, Fairfax District,and all the best restaurants West Hollywood has to offer.
Shopping, market, entertainment, and restaurants at your doorstep!
There is no laundry in this private guest house.
There is laundry at the corner in a laundromat which is walking distance of 1 block.

What you get here is a private residence, the lifestyle, and protectiveness of being completely detached but behind a single family home with sidewalks, walking distance to Melrose and Beverly in a fantastic residential locale.
Credit and background check required.
1 year lease available and for one person only, no pets, no smoking.
Showing by appointment with good credit.
Deposit: one month rent
**Will consider a very small dog**
E-mail to set up showing.
